title: Miscellaneous Provisions
content:

State Regulations

§ 6.19 - Records motor carriers are required to have on file
§ 6.20 - Bus drivers not properly licensed
§ 6.21 - Notification of an accident or a conviction resulting from a violation of the Vehicle and Traffic Law or a motor vehicle conviction in another state and license revocation

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
